law.catch_line: This section and §§ 136 through 138, 140 through 143, and 145 through 152 of this article apply to...

text.section: This section and §§ 136 through 138, 140 through 143, and 145 through 152 of this article apply to all counties, except Baltimore City and Queen Anne's County.
All applications for opening, altering or closing roads shall be by petition to the governing body.
